title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rebound as investors weigh U.S. ban on Russian energy - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks rebound as investors weigh U.S. ban on Russian energy  Yahoo Finance
description: Equities extended losses Tuesday following an announcement by President Joe Biden that the U.S. will ban Russian imports of oil and energy, stoking worries the move could raise gas prices further and worsen inflation. Fears of a recession spurred by concerns over the economic consequences of Russiaâ€™s war in Ukraine have prompted investors to jettison stocks and stockpile safe-haven assets in recent days.
